feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission clearly describes a functioning financial tool that analyzes investments (Discover), provides implementation details showing it integrates real financial data and structured outputs (Implement), and reflects on utility and safety (Reflect). These combined evidences demonstrate a thorough, working financial application, meeting PASS criteria.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates substantive, multi-faceted AI integration (persona modeling, structured output, RAG with real financial data) and describes technical implementation and safety measures, satisfying thorough treatment for a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I made an app that uh will analyze your investments or your business decisions like Warren Buffett"
"I made this uh with what I with react" / "it uses a rest API call to fetch uh the system prompt."

"there's also a section of the parse data... it has external data integration. Um, it has a pattern called rag which is retrieval augmented generation... it inserts the correct financial data and is analyzing real numbers."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — student defined a clear financial purpose (investment/business analysis).  
Implement — student described technical implementation (React, REST API, RAG, external data) demonstrating the app actually performs financial analyses.  
Reflect — student evaluated usefulness and safety constraints (no buy/sell recommendations), showing consideration of real-world financial application behavior.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes a functioning financial tool that analyzes investments (Discover), provides implementation details showing it integrates real financial data and structured outputs (Implement), and reflects on utility and safety (Reflect). These combined evidences demonstrate a thorough, working financial application, meeting PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "I made an app that uh will analyze your investments or your business decisions like Warren Buffett"

"it uses a rest API call to fetch uh the system prompt. And then uh it uses a technique called persona adaptation or adoption. And uh it includes like negative constraints ... it never gives specific buy or sell recommendations"

"there's also a section of the parse data that forces the AI to output JSON structured data alongside text... it has a pattern called rag which is retrieval augmented generation. So before sending the user's question to the AI, the code checks if the known ticker is mentioned and then it uh inserts the correct financial data and is analyzing real numbers."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: articulated the AI-driven goal (Buffett-style investment analysis).  
Implement: described concrete technical integrations (REST API for system prompt, persona adaptation, JSON output, RAG/external data insertion).  
Reflect: noted usefulness and safety constraints (avoiding buy/sell advice, reducing hallucinations).
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates substantive, multi-faceted AI integration (persona modeling, structured output, RAG with real financial data) and describes technical implementation and safety measures, satisfying thorough treatment for a PASS.
